trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="95596a66-6618-4a11-849a-492c4a0ddbcd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Activity</link> for the old JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="95596a66-6618-4a11-849a-492c4a0ddbcd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Activity</link> for the old JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel> Activity to run a MapReduce program on an HDInsight cluster from an Azure Data Factory pipeline.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel> Activity to run a MapReduce program on an HDInsight cluster from an Azure Data Factory pipeline.

trans-unit.source: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel> Activity in a pipeline JSON file.
trans-unit.target: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel> Activity in a pipeline JSON file.

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightMapReduce</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the class for <embeddedLabel>className</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the class for <embeddedLabel>className</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for <embeddedLabel>jarFilePath</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for <embeddedLabel>jarFilePath</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for <embeddedLabel>jarLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for <embeddedLabel>jarLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> section.
trans-unit.target: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> section.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>getDebugInfo</embeddedLabel> property is an optional element.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>getDebugInfo</embeddedLabel> property is an optional element.

trans-unit.source: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>Failure</embeddedLabel>, the logs are downloaded only on failure.
trans-unit.target: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>Failure</embeddedLabel>, the logs are downloaded only on failure.

trans-unit.source: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>All</embeddedLabel>, logs are always downloaded irrespective of the execution status.
trans-unit.target: When it is set to <embeddedLabel>All</embeddedLabel>, logs are always downloaded irrespective of the execution status.
